title: Have a good day, dear
creator_credit: Millbank Films, David Evans and Ron Tanner
brief_description: Describes some of the more common hazards met with in offices. Intended for all levels of office staff, including management. Cast includes Geoffrey Hinsliffe, Jayne Lester, Caroline Dowdeswell.
